TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TextView extends System.Web.UI.MobileControls.PagedControl

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: 提供用于显示大量文本的可编程控件，并带有用于移动页的可选标记。

span.span: Provides a programmable control for displaying larger amounts of text, with optional markup tags on a mobile page.

summary.span: 有关如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与不同的是移动窗体中的文字文本，你可以设置的内容代码中。Unlike literal text in a mobile form, you can set content of a from code. 与移动不同控件，你可以包含的值中的标记属性。Unlike a mobile control, you can include markup within the value of the property. 此外，控件是小心，不要在分页分解插入的元素，如链路。Also, the control is careful not to break up inserted elements such as links during pagination. 有关详细信息，请参阅[文字文本在窗体标记](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05e061ed-9916-4ece-bfc8-7bf131fe232e)。For more information, see [Literal Text Inside Form Markup](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05e061ed-9916-4ece-bfc8-7bf131fe232e). 如果控件位于内，将其设置属性`true`以允许在移动设备上的多个页之间流动的文本。If the control is within a , set the property to `true` to allow text to flow across multiple pages on mobile devices. 如果控件将不处于的名称控制属性。If the control is not in a , put the name of the control into the property. 大多数其他属性和方法移动控件都将使用对新的设备适配器的开发人员更多用于呈现特定设备上的内容。Most other properties and methods of the mobile control are of more use to developers of new device adapters for rendering the contents on specific devices. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件可用来显示用户输入，这可能包含恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 检查从客户端可执行的脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送在你的应用程序中显示它的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 验证控件可用于在控件中显示输入的文本之前验证用户输入。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供的一输入的请求验证功能块脚本和 HTML 在用户输入。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护标准控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)，[如何： 保护对脚本利用在 Web 应用程序中进行应用 HTML 编码为字符串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[中验证用户输入ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建数字和标识每个句子中的质数并将添加到这些句子控件。The following code example creates numbers and identifies each prime number in a sentence, and adds those sentences to the control. 此示例还使用自定义分页以一次可以提供完整的文本的一个网页。The example also uses custom pagination to provide only a page full of text at a time. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileTextViewSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileTextViewSample/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileTextViewSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileTextViewSample/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性由自定义设备适配器的开发人员用于呈现内容。The property is used by developers of custom device adapters for rendering the contents. 如果为零，此属性不影响分页。If zero, pagination is not affected by this property. 如果不为零，将覆盖在分页窗体时，每页显示的项。If nonzero, overrides items displayed per page when the form is paginated. 默认值为 0。The default value is zero. 支持内部分页的移动控件还提供一种称为自定义分页功能。Mobile controls that support internal pagination also provide a feature called custom pagination. 通常情况下，此类控件要求你提供这些它们可以显示的所有数据。Normally, such controls require you to provide them all the data that they can display. 开发人员指定的列表中的项的总数属性。Developers specify the total number of items that are in the list in the property. 属性指定每一页控件显示的项数。The property specifies how many items the control displays per page. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置每次回发的项数。The following code example sets the number of items for each postback. 此示例的一个更大的示例摘自类概述。This example is part of a larger example for the class overview. [!code-csharp[MobileTextViewSample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileTextViewSample/cs/Default.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[MobileTextViewSample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileTextViewSample/vb/Default.aspx#2)]

summary.span: 在控件自定义分页且需要更多数据时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a control is custom-paginated and needs more data.

summary.span: 此 API 已过时。

span.span: This API is obsolete.

summary.span: 有关如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自定义分页控制时，你不要显式绑定控件。When control is custom-paginated, you do not explicitly bind the control. 分页后，控件将引发此事件，指示哪些部分数据必需的。After pagination, the control raises this event, indicating what part of the data is required. 应用程序可以处理此事件，并将绑定具有所需的数据的控件。The application can handle this event and bind the control with the required data. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建自定义分页和调用方法以加载指定的数目的每页的项。The following code example demonstrates how to create custom pagination and call the method to load a specified number of items per page. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileTextViewSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileTextViewSample/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileTextViewSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileTextViewSample/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关标记信息 (如\)，中支持其属性，请参阅类的讨论。For information about the tags (such as \) that supports in its property, see the class discussion. 属性可以通过使用指定`Text`属性，或为内部文本。The property can be specified by using the `Text` attribute, or as inner text. 如果中这两种方式指定属性，则内部文本始终优先。If the property is specified in both ways, the inner text always takes precedence. 但是，如果属性以编程方式设置，则内部文本将自动删除并且新的设置将优先。However, if the property is programmatically set, the inner text is automatically removed and the new setting takes precedence.
